sentences.en: Application: reinforcement , separation and protection of the road base and the wall.
sentences.cn: 耐磨,耐顶刺.应用: 土体和地基的加固. 隔离和防护.

sentences.en: Asbestos reinforcement confers excellent flame retardation properties on a composite.
sentences.cn: 石棉增强材料使复合材料具有优异的防火性能.

sentences.en: He found that the reinforcement in the slab is curtailed.
sentences.cn: 他已发现板内钢筋削减.

sentences.en: I am sure that this meeting will contribute to the reinforcement of peace and security all over the world.
sentences.cn: 我相信这次会议将会促进世界范围内的和平与安全。

sentences.en: It is more than three thousand miles from reinforcement by the Atlantic and Home Fleets.
sentences.cn: 要用大西洋舰队和本国舰队去支援,还得航行三千哩以上.

sentences.en: Joints between reinforcement members can be made satisfactorily with tin solder.
sentences.cn: 锡焊能够满意地做成加筋构件之间的接头.

sentences.en: Mesh sizes 50 - 200 are wire cloth screen with perforated stainless steel reinforcement.
sentences.cn: 网孔规格尺寸50~200是金属丝布网,并采用穿孔不锈钢加固.

sentences.en: More likely than not, recognition is the most available and effective form of ongoing positive reinforcement.
sentences.cn: 很可能赏识是最可取的,是目前能起积极推动作用的有效形式.

sentences.en: Praise and positive reinforcement are an important part of the Matsushita philosophy.
sentences.cn: 表扬和正面帮助是松下哲学思想的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: The bridge needs some structural reinforcement.
sentences.cn: 这座桥需要结构性加固。

sentences.en: The designer chooses the layout of reinforcement.
The general assessed the situation and called for reinforcement.
sentences.cn: 这位将军估计了形势并要求增援.

sentences.en: The interface between the resin and the filler or reinforcement is of utmost importance.
sentences.cn: 在树脂与填料或增强材料之间的界面是极其重要的.

sentences.en: There are reinforcement bars on all doors.
sentences.cn: 所有的门上都有钢筋条加固。

sentences.en: What the teacher now has to do is remove the reinforcement for this bad behaviour.
sentences.cn: 现在老师要做的是避免这种不良行为更加严重。

sentences.en: With the air reinforcement, Utah was a swift smooth landing.
sentences.cn: 在空军的支援下, 犹他海滩是一次快速、平稳的登陆.

words.tran_cn: 增强剂；加强件；增强材料；强化刺激
求援；得到增援；给予更多的支持
加固；增援；援军；[建][车辆]加强

phrases.tran_cn: 混凝土配筋；混凝土钢筋
纤维增强；纤维强化热固性；纤维强化复合材料
网状钢筋；钢筋网；钢丝网配筋

trans.tran_en: the act of making something stronger
